Package de.syquel.maven.reactorstate.common

Class SavedReactorStateManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.syquel.maven.reactorstate.common.AbstractReactorStateManager
      • de.syquel.maven.reactorstate.common.SavedReactorStateManager
  • public class SavedReactorStateManager
extends AbstractReactorStateManager
    The implementation of a Maven Reactor state manager which operates on the saved state of Maven modules within a Maven project.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      static SavedReactorStateManager create​(org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession session, org.apache.maven.project.ProjectBuilder projectBuilder)
      Instantiates a Reactor state manager based on the saved state of the Maven project and its Maven modules.
      void restoreProjectStates​(org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession session, org.apache.maven.project.MavenProjectHelper projectHelper)
      Restores the saved state of the Maven projects and its Maven modules within the current Maven execution.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static SavedReactorStateManager create​(org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession session,
                                              org.apache.maven.project.ProjectBuilder projectBuilder)
                                       throws org.apache.maven.project.ProjectBuildingException,
                                              IOException
        Instantiates a Reactor state manager based on the saved state of the Maven project and its Maven modules.
        Parameters:
        session - The current Maven execution for the Maven project build.
        projectBuilder - The builder for Maven projects from POMs.
        Returns:
        A Reactor state manager with the saved state of the Maven project and its Maven modules.
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.project.ProjectBuildingException - if an invalid POM is encountered.
        IOException - if an error occurred while reading the persisted state.

      • restoreProjectStates

        public void restoreProjectStates​(org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession session,
                                 org.apache.maven.project.MavenProjectHelper projectHelper)
        Restores the saved state of the Maven projects and its Maven modules within the current Maven execution.
        Parameters:
        session - The current Maven execution.
        projectHelper - The helper for Maven-related operations on the current state.
